name: Toady McLick
description:
Toady McLick is a ribbeting story about a frog that has broken free from his aquarium, found himself upon a bunch of floating islands, and he must spin to win. (Jam games, man.. You start with one idea, you get short on time, and the next you know you find yourself making an infinite runner because you don't have time to design levels. Imagination is absolutely essential here, so bare with me.)

Controls:

[A] [D] - Move Left and Right

[Space] - Jump

[Left Mouse] - Tongue Hookshot

This game was made for the GMTK2020 game jam, the theme was "Out of Control"

Lucy Lavend - Art, Islands, SFX

Game Endeavor - Code
